### 1. In a R markdown, load the tinyverse and a package called palmerpenguins

```{r}
library("tidyverse") 
library(palmerpenguins)
```

### 2. What are the dimensions of the data set penguins? 

```{r}
penguins
```
```{r}
dim(penguins)
```

### 3. What are the names of the variables in the penguins dataset?

```{r}
names(penguins)
```

```{r}
glimpse(penguins) #different option to get variables
```

### 4. How many individuals were sampled on each island in the penguins dataset?

```{r}
penguins <- penguins 
```

```{r}
table(penguins$island)
```

```{r}
summary(penguins$island) #different option to use as well
```

### 5. What is the mean body mass for all individuals in the penguins dataset? 
```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm = T)
```
